Package com.diffplug.common.swt

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Coat
    For populating composites.
    Coat.Returning<T>
    A Coat which returns a handle to the content it created.
    Coat.Reusable<T>
    A Coat with the ability to be hidden, redisplayed, and deduplicated.
    InteractiveTest.FailsWithoutUser
    Marker interface for interactive tests that aren't compatible with auto-close.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorManager
    Caches colors, and manages their disposal.
    ControlWrapper<T extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control>
    Wraps an SWT Control to hide most of its API.
    ImageDescriptors
    Utilities for using ImageDescriptors correctly.
    InteractiveTest
    InteractiveTest opens a Coat or a Shell, and displays instructions for a human tester to determine whether the test passed or failed.
    Layouts
    Provides fluent utilities for manipulating SWT layouts.
    LayoutsFillLayout
    A fluent api for setting and modifying a FillLayout.
    LayoutsGridData
    A fluent api for setting and modifying a GridData.
    LayoutsGridLayout
    A fluent api for setting and modifying a GridLayout.
    OnePerWidget<WidgetType extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget,T>
    Simple little class which handles objects that need one-to-one correspondence with an SWT Widget of some type, but need to be shared.
    Shells
    A fluent builder for creating SWT shells.
    SwtExec
    A ScheduledExecutorService and Rx.HasRxExecutor which delegates calls to Display.asyncExec() and syncExec().
    SwtExec.Blocking  
    SwtMisc
    Miscellaneous SWT functions.
